classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

color.description: The color of the button when it is selected. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
color.description_zh: 选择按钮时按钮的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。
color.type: standard| primary| secondary| error| info| success| warning| string

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled. This implies that all ToggleButton children will be disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。这意味着所有 ToggleButton 子项都将被禁用。

exclusive.description: If true, only allow one of the child ToggleButton values to be selected.
exclusive.description_zh: 如果为 true，则仅允许选择子 ToggleButton 值之一。

fullWidth.description: If true, the button group will take up the full width of its container.
fullWidth.description_zh: 如果为 true，则按钮组将占用其容器的整个宽度。

onChange.description: Callback fired when the value changes.Signature:function(event: React.MouseEvent, value: any) => voidevent The event source of the callback.value of the selected buttons. When exclusive is true this is a single value; when false an array of selected values. If no value is selected and exclusive is true the value is null; when false an empty array.
onChange.description_zh: 当值更改时触发回调。Signature：function（event： React.MouseEvent， value： any） => voidevent 所选按钮的 callback.value 的事件源。当 exclusive 为 true 时，这是一个值;如果为 false，则为选定值的数组。如果未选择任何值且 exclusive 为 true，则值为 null;当为 false 时，为空数组。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

value.description: The currently selected value within the group or an array of selected values when exclusive is false.The value must have reference equality with the option in order to be selected.
value.description_zh: 组内的当前选定值或所选值的数组（当独占时）为 false。该值必须与选项具有引用相等性才能被选中。

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback fired when the value changes.Signature:event The event source of the callback.value of the selected buttons. When exclusive is true this is a single value; when false an array of selected values. If no value is selected and exclusive is true the value is null; when false an empty array.
events.description_zh: 当值更改时触发回调。Signature：event 所选按钮的 callback.value 的事件源。当 exclusive 为 true 时，这是一个值;如果为 false，则为选定值的数组。如果未选择任何值且 exclusive 为 true，则值为 null;当为 false 时，为空数组。
